mapper.select: select it_img.it_itemno as itItemNo, it_img.filepath as filePath, it_item.user_Id as userId, it_title as itItemTitle, it_content as itItemContent, it_name as itItemName, it_color as itItemColor, it_size as itItemSize, brand as itItembrand, hashTag as hashTag, it_item.Item_code as itemCode, user_size as userSize, user_height as userHeight, reg_Date as regDate, it_item.del_yn as delYN, nickName as nickName, item_name as itemName, member_img.filePath as profileFilePath from it_img left join it_item on (it_img.it_itemno=it_item.it_itemno) left join member on (it_item.user_Id=member.user_Id) left join Item_category on (it_item.item_code=item_category.item_code) left join member_img on (it_item.user_id=member_img.user_id) where top_YN='Y' and it_item.del_yn='N'
